      • FoodAndDrink

        public FoodAndDrink(java.lang.String name,
                    int amount,
                    int price,
                    FoodAndDrink.FoodAndDrinkType type,
                    int healtRecovery,
                    int manaRecovery)
        This constructor creates every consumable items that are not potions.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the consumable
        amount - the amount of that item available.
        price - the price of that item
        type - the consumable type of that item
        healtRecovery - the amount of health it recovers
        manaRecovery - the amount of mana it recovers.
